widget.convert: {"templates": {"default": (75,[ MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos = (18, 12), size = (48, 48), png = 5), # index 5 is the status pixmap MultiContentEntryText(pos = (90, 7), size = (690, 26), font=0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 0), # index 0 is the name MultiContentEntryText(pos = (100, 33), size = (690, 38), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 2), # index 2 is the description ]), "category": (75,[ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (15, 7), size = (690, 26), font=0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 0), # index 0 is the name MultiContentEntryText(pos = (15, 33), size = (690, 22), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 1), # index 1 is the description ]) }, "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 20),gFont("Regular", 18)], "itemHeight": 75 }

{"template": [ MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos = (18, 14), size = (48, 48), png = 2), # index 2 is the status pixmap MultiContentEntryText(pos = (90, 5), size = (565, 26), font=0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 0), # index 0 is the name MultiContentEntryText(pos = (90, 33), size = (565, 38), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 1), # index 1 is the state ], "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 20),gFont("Regular", 18)], "itemHeight": 75 }

screen.name: MessageBox
screen.title: Message
screen.applet: from enigma import eSize, ePoint orgwidth = self.instance.size().width() orgpos = self.instance.position() textsize = self["text"].getSize() textsize = (textsize[0] + 50, textsize[1] + 20) wsizex = textsize[0] + 60 wsizey = textsize[1] if (64 > wsizey): wsizey = 64 if self.type == self.TYPE_YESNO: wsizey += 60 if (280 > wsizex): wsizex = 280 wsize = (wsizex, wsizey) self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize)) self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize)) listsize = (wsizex, 50) self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(0, textsize[1])) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize)) newwidth = wsize[0] self.instance.move(ePoint(orgpos.x() + (orgwidth - newwidth)/2, orgpos.y()))

widget.convert: {"templates": {"default": (40, [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (10, 8), size = (0, 0), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 1), # key, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (10, 8), size = (60, 27), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 2), # number, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (60, 8), size = (150, 27), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 3), # description, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (260, 8), size = (400, 27), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 4), # language, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (620, 8), size = (20, 27), font = 1, flags = RT_HALIGN_RIGHT, text = 5), # selection, ], True, "showNever"), "notselected": (40, [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (5, 8), size = (40, 27), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 1), # key, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (5, 8), size = (60, 27), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 2), # number, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (60, 8), size = (150, 27), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 3), # description, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (260, 8), size = (400, 27), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 4), # language, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (630, 8), size = (20, 27), font = 1, flags = RT_HALIGN_RIGHT, text = 5), # selection, ], False, "showNever") }, "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 20), gFont("Regular", 20)], "itemHeight": 40 }

{"template": [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (10, 10), size = (670, 40), flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 1), # index 1 is the nim name, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (10, 40), size = (670, 80), font = 1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_WRAP, text = 2), # index 2 is a description of the nim settings, ], "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 22), gFont("Regular", 20)], "itemHeight": 120 }

eLabel.text: View your Weather Plugin Menu details. You may be asked for these when speaking to Customer Services.
View your Software Update Plugin Menu details. You may be asked for these when speaking to Customer Services.

screen.name: MessageBoxSimple
screen.title: Message
screen.applet: from enigma import eSize, ePoint orgwidth = self.instance.size().width() orgpos = self.instance.position() textsize = self["text"].getSize() textsize = (textsize[0] + 50, textsize[1] + 20) wsizex = textsize[0] + 60 wsizey = textsize[1] if (64 > wsizey): wsizey = 64 if self.type == self.TYPE_YESNO: wsizey += 60 if (280 > wsizex): wsizex = 280 wsize = (wsizex, wsizey) self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize)) self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize)) listsize = (wsizex, 50) self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(0, textsize[1])) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize)) newwidth = wsize[0] self.instance.move(ePoint(orgpos.x() + (orgwidth - newwidth)/2, orgpos.y()))

widget.convert: {"template": [ MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaBlend(pos = (10, 5), size = (48, 48), png = 4), # index 4 is the status pixmap MultiContentEntryText(pos = (60, 5), size = (588, 30), font=0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 0, color = 0x00ffffff, color_sel = 0x00ffffff), # index 0 is the name MultiContentEntryText(pos = (60, 27), size = (588, 20), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 2, color = 0x00ffffff, color_sel = 0x00ffffff), # index 2 is the description MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaBlend(pos = (5, 55), size = (638, 1), png = 5), # index 4 is the div pixmap ], "fonts": [gFont("Regular",20),gFont("Regular",15)], "itemHeight": 50 }
